edu.amc.sakai.user

Interface LdapConnectionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PoolingLdapConnectionManager, SimpleLdapConnectionManager

    public interface LdapConnectionManager
    Implementations manage LDAPConnection allocation.
    Author:
    Dan McCallum, Unicon Inc, John Lewis, Unicon Inc
    See Also:
    LdapConnectionManager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Shuts down an instance.
      com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection getBoundConnection(String dn, String pw)
      Retrieve a bound LDAPConnection using the indicated credentials
      LdapConnectionManagerConfig getConfig()
      Retrieve the currently assigned LdapConnectionManagerConfig.
      com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection getConnection()
      Retrieve an LDAPConnection -- the connection may already be bound depending on the configuration
      void init()
      Initializes an instance for use, typically by digesting the contents of the assigned LdapConnectionManagerConfig.
      void returnConnection(com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection conn)
      Return an LDAPConnection.
      void setConfig(LdapConnectionManagerConfig config)
      Assign the LDAPConnection management configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initializes an instance for use, typically by digesting the contents of the assigned LdapConnectionManagerConfig. Usually called by Spring.

      • getConnection

        com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection getConnection()
                                             throws com.novell.ldap.LDAPException
        Retrieve an LDAPConnection -- the connection may already be bound depending on the configuration
        Returns:
        a connected LDAPConnection
        Throws:
        com.novell.ldap.LDAPException - if the LDAPConnection allocation fails

      • getBoundConnection

        com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection getBoundConnection(String dn,
                                                String pw)
                                                  throws com.novell.ldap.LDAPException
        Retrieve a bound LDAPConnection using the indicated credentials
        Parameters:
        dn - the distringuished name for binding
        pw - the password for binding
        Returns:
        a connected LDAPConnection
        Throws:
        com.novell.ldap.LDAPException - if the LDAPConnection allocation fails

      • returnConnection

        void returnConnection(com.novell.ldap.LDAPConnection conn)
        Return an LDAPConnection. This can allow for connections to be pooled instead of just destroyed.
        Parameters:
        conn - an LDAPConnection that you no longer need

      • setConfig

        void setConfig(LdapConnectionManagerConfig config)
        Assign the LDAPConnection management configuration. Should typically be invoked once and followed by a call to init().
        Parameters:
        config - a reference to a LdapConnectionManagerConfig. Should be cacheable without defensive copying.

      • getConfig

        LdapConnectionManagerConfig getConfig()
        Retrieve the currently assigned LdapConnectionManagerConfig.
        Returns:
        the currently assigned LdapConnectionManagerConfig, if any

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Shuts down an instance. Usually called by Spring.
